title: The Axis
description:
The Axis is perhaps the most versatile board in the lineup, equipped to excel as a carver, commuter, cruiser, freerider, and even entry level downhill. The Axis has a symmetrical snowboard inspired shape that offers quick rail-to-rail performance, with drop-through mounting for a more ergonomic push and power through turns and slides.

L: 40.00"
W: 9.00"
WB: 30.00"

The Axis comes with a Hawaiin Koa topsheet with art by Matt Smith, a Bamboo topsheet with art by Nanami Cowdroy, a Walnut topsheet with art by Patrick Vaughan, and a Griptape topsheet with art by Zach Johnsen.

Check out the Axis here:
Koa -- arborcollective.com/skate/boards/view/409922/axis
Bamboo -- arborcollective.com/skate/boards/view/409923/axis-bamboo
Walnut -- arborcollective.com/skate/boards/view/483961/axis-walnut
Griptape -- arborcollective.com/skate/boards/view/426738/axis-gt

Check out Arbor everywhere:
arborcollective.com
